thread.title: What Is a ‘Sudden Stop’ in Markets?

author: Simon Constable
title: What Is a ‘Sudden Stop’ in Markets?
text:
People who invest in emerging economies should be aware that sometimes market sentiment can take a sharp turn for the worse very quickly.
It’s what economists such as Daniel Lacalle of London-based money-management firm Tressis call a sudden stop.
They are referring to the flow of private capital into a country. Cash tends to migrate toward...
